channel.title: Cloud, DevOps, Databases & AI with Michael
channel.description: Recent content on Cloud, DevOps, Databases & AI with Michael

item.title: AWS Updates
item.description: AWS main updates week of 06/17/2024 FOCUS is a new open-source cloud billing data specification that provides standardization to simplify cloud financial management across multiple sources. Data Exports for FOCUS 1.0 includes several AWS-specific columns, such as usage types and cost categories, and delivers exports on a daily basis to Amazon S3 as Parquet or CSV files. Anthropicâ€™s Claude 3.5 Sonnet foundation model is now generally available in Amazon Bedrock. That was fast :-)

item.title: Rich Content Via Hugo
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. YouTube privacy enhanced shortcode The youtube shortcode embeds a responsive video player for YouTube videos. Only the ID of the video is required, e.g.: YouTube URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qHkcs3kG44 Shortcode: {{< youtube 3qHkcs3kG44 >}} Rendered output: Headings To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase.
